subject: Urgent: Your Account Has Been Compromised
body: Dear Customer, We have detected suspicious activity on your account. Click here immediately to verify your identity: http://secure-bank-verify.com/login. Failure to respond within 24 hours will result in account suspension. Best regards, Security Team

subject: Q3 Financial Report - Action Required
body: Hi Team, Please find attached the Q3 financial report for review. The board meeting is scheduled for Friday at 2pm. Let me know if you have any questions. Thanks, Sarah

subject: You've Won $1,000,000!
body: CONGRATULATIONS!!! You have been selected as our GRAND PRIZE WINNER! To claim your $1,000,000 prize, simply send us your bank details and a small processing fee of $50. ACT NOW before this offer expires!!! Click here: http://claim-your-prize-now.tk

subject: Meeting Reminder: Project Sync
body: Hi everyone, Just a reminder about our project sync meeting tomorrow at 10am in Conference Room B. Please come prepared with your status updates. See you there!

subject: Your PayPal Account is Limited
body: Dear PayPal User, Your account access has been limited. We noticed unusual login activity and need you to confirm your identity. Please login here: http://paypa1-secure.com/verify to restore full access. PayPal Security

subject: Invoice #INV-2024-0892
body: Please find attached invoice #INV-2024-0892 for services rendered in October. Payment is due within 30 days. If you have any questions, please contact our billing department.

subject: URGENT: IRS Tax Refund Notification
body: The IRS has calculated that you are owed a tax refund of $4,521.00. To receive your refund, you must verify your identity within 48 hours. Click here to claim: http://irs-refund-claim.info

subject: Team Lunch Friday
body: Hey team! We're organizing a team lunch this Friday at the Italian place downtown. Please RSVP by Wednesday so I can make reservations. Looking forward to it!

subject: Apple ID Suspended - Immediate Action Required
body: Your Apple ID has been suspended due to security concerns. Someone tried to access your account from an unknown device. Verify your account immediately: http://apple-id-verify.com/secure

subject: Weekly Newsletter: Tech Updates
body: This week in tech: AI continues to transform security operations, new vulnerability discovered in popular framework, and tips for better password hygiene. Read more on our blog.

subject: Confirm Your Amazon Order
body: Your recent order #112-4532891-7621345 is being processed. If you did not place this order for $892.00, click here immediately to cancel: http://amazon-order-cancel.tk/verify

subject: Expense Report Approved
body: Your expense report for the client visit has been approved. Reimbursement will be processed in the next payroll cycle. Thanks for submitting on time.

subject: Your Netflix Account Has Been Locked
body: We were unable to validate your billing information for the next billing cycle. Update your payment method here: http://netflix-billing-update.com or your account will be cancelled.

subject: Project Update: Sprint 23 Complete
body: Team, Sprint 23 is now complete. We delivered 15 story points and closed 8 bugs. Great work everyone! Sprint 24 planning is tomorrow morning.

subject: LinkedIn: Someone viewed your profile
body: Hi Professional, 47 people viewed your profile this week. Upgrade to Premium to see who's interested in you: http://linkedin-premium-offer.tk/upgrade

subject: Office Closure Notice
body: Please note the office will be closed on Thursday for the national holiday. Remote work is available for those who need it. Enjoy the long weekend!

subject: Microsoft Account Unusual Activity
body: Unusual sign-in activity detected on your Microsoft account from Russia. If this wasn't you, secure your account immediately: http://microsoft-account-secure.info

subject: Birthday Celebration for Tom
body: Don't forget! We're celebrating Tom's birthday in the break room at 3pm today. Cake and snacks provided. See you there!

subject: Verify Your Bank of America Account
body: Dear Valued Customer, We need to verify your account information. Please click the link below and enter your credentials: http://boa-verify-account.net/secure

subject: New Feature Release Announcement
body: We're excited to announce the release of version 2.5! New features include improved performance, dark mode, and enhanced security. Update your app today.

subject: Your DHL Package Delivery Failed
body: Delivery attempt failed. Your package could not be delivered due to incomplete address. Reschedule delivery here: http://dhl-tracking-redeliver.tk

subject: Quarterly All-Hands Meeting
body: Reminder: The quarterly all-hands meeting is next Tuesday at 2pm in the main auditorium. CEO will be presenting the company roadmap.

subject: Dropbox: Your storage is almost full
body: You've used 95% of your Dropbox storage. Upgrade now to avoid losing access to your files: http://dropbox-upgrade-storage.info/premium

subject: Customer Feedback Survey
body: We value your opinion! Please take 5 minutes to complete our customer satisfaction survey. Your feedback helps us improve.

subject: Wells Fargo Security Alert
body: Your debit card ending in 4521 was used for a $2,340 purchase. If unauthorized, call immediately or click here: http://wellsfargo-fraud-alert.net
